title: Executive Order 12116-Issuance of Food Stamps by the Postal Service
content: By the authority vested in me as President of the United States of America by Section 1 l(k) of the Food Stamp Act of 1977 (91 Stat. 974; 7 U.S.C. 2020 (k)),1 the United States Postal Service is hereby granted approval for post offices in all or part of any State to issue food stamps to eligible households, upon request by the appropriate State agency, as defined in Section 3(n) of the Food Stamp Act of 1977 (91 Stat. 960; 7 U.S.C. 2012(n)).

JIMMY CARTER
The White House,
January 19, 1979.
citation: Jimmy Carter, Executive Order 12116-Issuance of Food Stamps by the Postal Service Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/249914
